content: पराक्रम् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To display courage, strength or heroism, act bravely; बकवच्चिंतयेदर्थान् सिंहवच्च पराक्रमेत् <ls>Ms. 7. 106</ls>; इत्युक्त्वा खे पराक्रंस्त <ls>Bk. 8. 22</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 8.">94.</ls> {@--2@} To turn back. {@--3@} To march against, attack. {@--4@} To march forward, advance.
